page.title: 04Dunnington Sports Club
page.content: The Sports Centre is situated on Common Lane about 200 metres from the village.The actual centre and its grounds cover about 7 acres and is sponsored by John Smiths Tadcaster Brewery. The indoor games are table tennis, bridge, darts, dominoes, billards, pool, card games and 3 squash courts. There are 4 changing rooms each with a shower. Upstairs there is a bar and tables like a pub. On the bar the pumps sell John Smith's Bitter, Tetley Bitter and Dry Blackthorn Cider. It also has a Space Invader game, a fruit machine and another darts board. The outdoor games are cricket,bowls, hockey, football and tennis each with flourishing teams.
